Posts.Title: waiting on answers melanomafirst lford91

Posts.Content: Nov 10, 2010 11:03AM melanomafirst wrote: Answers received!  It is B9!  I was sent to a surgeon to see what the next step is.  I have schlerosing intraductal papilloma at one spot and the other was ok.  The surgeon thinks the papilloma was completly gotten and there were no cancer cells, no atipical signs either.  This was very good it seems.  She wants to see me back in 6 months for a follow up mamo and digital.  NO SURGERY!  God is good!  Even though the wait was horrible and now I have a tye-dyed boob that will get better by 3 to 4 weeks, but I'm good with that.  This website is such a blessing.  A great place to share with others and keep each other in our prayers daily.  ~Mel
Posts.Title: waiting on answers melanomafirst lford91
